hymn.title: While Christ Builds His Church
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Grace for Suffering

'Tis not what we face but 'tis how much grace we re -- ceive in the midst of our cir -- cum -- stanc -- es. lyrics.stanza: While Christ builds His church, Gates of Hades will Rise up to attack us But will never prevail.
'Tis not what we face But 'tis how much grace We receive in the midst Of our circumstances.
Why not turn to prayer For those in need like us While we can sympathize, that Through this we all gain Christ.
